General.Name: Changzhou Langbo Seal Polytron Technologies Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Changzhou Langbo Sealing Technologies Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells precision seals, rubber and plastic products, metal processing parts, and precision cavity molds in China. The company provides auto turbo tubes, automotive fuel system seals, auto gearbox fuel tank, automobile engine oil seals, automobile brake system rubber parts, automotive brake booster rubber parts, automotive lamp system rubber parts, automobile power steering system rubber parts, automotive brake master cylinder seals, automotive air conditioning rubber parts, and automotive air conditioning seal parts. It also provides railway sleeper pads, bogie system elastic positioning sleeves, and motor air duct rubber parts; engineering machinery rubber products; and aviation series rubber products. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Changzhou, China.
